purpose: human body poses and simple gesture fragments for character/composition prompts

reference.desc: canonical/modeling reference poses used for rigging or neutral framing

ground.desc: seated, kneeling or prone poses at ground level

gestures.desc: arm/hand gestures and small expressive actions

notes: t-pose and a-pose are technical/reference entries; contrapposto is stylistic but often used as a standing variant.
victory pose and jumping for joy overlap semantically (both express exuberance); consider merging or weighting to avoid redundancy.
file is concise and token-efficient for SDXL wildcard usage; categories balance static vs dynamic and gestures vs full-body poses.
